sub_title: DPA CSR & DPM DRP Planner at DOW
summary:
I’m an operational and committed professional manager with a demonstrated experience in: Key Account Management, Project Management, Purchasing, Business Development, Sales, and Import-Export.
My entrepreneurial mindset gives me a great taste for challenges and big goals.
Naturally optimistic and open-minded, I like to get things done by elaborating creative solutions in collaboration.
Over 10 years of working in various fields (Textile, Automotive, Chemicals, SaaS, Printing) and in different countries (Turkey, France, Belgium), I have developed a strong ability to adapt to changing situations and to different cultures.
Target-oriented and proactive, I will go the extra smile to exceed clients’ expectations and I will commit to contribute to the organization’s growth & profitability.

profile_positions.description: Customer Service activities for Plastic Additives, for both Export&Domestic and also Supply Chain Planning for Performance Monomers
profile_positions.title: DPA CSR & DPM DRP Planner

profile_positions.description:
Ömür Printing serves customers in sheet fed offset printing since 1981. At our production plant in Haramidere, which we moved in 2006, we handle pre-press, press and post-press processes in our own facility.

We process our work in our machine park consisting of 43 Heidelberg printing units, featuring ten colour 25x35 cm to 70x100 cm presses.

We speak English, German, Italian, French, Persian and Dutch like our native language and export 50% of our production to 42 countries in the world.

We produce for many domestic and foreign corporate companies; catalogues, brochures, advertising and promotional documents such as magazines and posters, turn cards, POP materials such as free-standing booths. We print products like diaries, calendars, notepads which are suitable for special day promotions and any material which requires printing on paper.

We handle many meticulous applications such as foil printing, embossing, embossed spot UV (embossed lacquer), hard cover and scratch-off.

We serve our customers 24 hours a day. Thanks to our organizational strengths, we ensure that shipments are made in a timely and complete manner.

We participate in international trade fairs for over 10 years, particularly London and Frankfurt Book Fairs. We introduce our company to demand European companies and we create export opportunities.

We make significant investments on production capacity of Ömür. We closely follow new technological developments in every field, whether regarding our Machine Park or materials used in production.

We make world-class and environment-friendly production. Thus we ensure a customer satisfaction oriented and also sustainable success.


Mission > Develop Printing Solutions to B2B Clients

Responsible of new business development in French speaking area

Building the bridge between customer needs and printing team

Key Account Management
profile_positions.title: Key Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
MGS Software is located in Istanbul, with 45 young and
dynamic staff members working on realizing the ideas of
businesses and entrepreneurs, and providing support to
them in every step of the digitization process.
As part of our work culture we see our clients as business
partners rather than customers, we embrace their needs
and see them come true. We understand your needs and
goals perfectly and we develop applications that suit your
short-term and long-term plans. We provide you with high
quality products in a timely fashion with the most
reasonable prices in the market.
The satisfaction of our business partners and achieving
growth and success with them is our biggest target and
motivation.

Our services include providing customized E-commerce, Mobile, Web, and Desktop applications and Social Media solutions to
all sectors. We make sure you focus only on your business while we work on realizing your ideas.
As the MGS Software team we keep our eyes on new technologies and ways to harness them for your service, we strive for
success, modernness, and innovation when developing each one of our projects. 


* Building new business by introducing made to measure SaaS to world leader clients.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
SYMedya was a start-up, launched in the aim of building and prosecuting innovative e-commerce platforms, for European market. The flagship of SYMedya was the online bespoke shirt platform, titled "tailorissimo". Published in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Turkish, "tailorissimo" was targeting more than 500 million potential clients.
•	Leading the Start–Up Team
•	Transformation of a Traditional Artisan Business to a Large-Scale E-Commerce
•	Specifying both Online and Offline Sales & Marketing Instruments
•	Managing Digital Marketing Solutions for Member Recruitment and Sales
•	Building Partnerships
•	Increasing customer loyalty
•	Building the Business Strategy
•	Sourcing textile raw materials and IT services
•	Development and monitoring of bespoke shirts from collection to production 
•	Close collaboration with tailors, shirt manufacturers and fabric manufacturers
•	Defining and Implementing Clockwork Logistic Operations
•	Guaranteeing Supply Chain Management and Right-On-Time Deliveries
•	Transformation of a Traditional Artisan Business to a Large-Scale E-Commerce
•	Negotiating with service providers, good suppliers, project partners, and marketing materials
•	Quality Follow-Up and Satisfaction Surveillance in the aim of Process Improvement
•	Improving Cost Efficiency
•	Assuring Financial Discipline, Analysing Costs & Investment Priorities
•	Forecasting and Execution of Target ROIs
•	Adapting E-commerce Platform due to Client Requirements
•	Recruiting Talents and Constructing the Cooperate Structure
